review: He is not only a doctor but Massiah. He operated both of knees in 2006 at Apollo and leased me new life. I am perfectly alright and pray for his well-being and long life. I salute him

Truly dependable Ortho consultant.  I came in contact  with him in the year 2007  hrough a friend  of mine and I tell you from his 1st approach I was impressed.  He dis my TKR on my left knee in the year 2007 and then 2nd knee in the year 2012. Now also when I need I consult him. Very humble , helpful and confident person. I still recommend his name. I was 62yrs when my 1st TKR was done. With both the knee replace I still play Golf regularly  I am now 78yrs. I can proudly say I am inspiration to so many persons.

I had back pain from more than 15 years and couldn’t walk or stand properly 
Did all Physiotherapy’s
Ayurvedic treatment 
Electro magnetic treatment 
Visited Dr surya sir
He recommended surgery 
And I was able to walk with 3 hours after surgery 
Now no back pain and I am normal

My mom had consulted the doctor and it was for knee arthritis related. ****** *** **** ** ********** **. I am satisfied with the explanation given. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family and friends. There was more waiting time when we went. It was for 45 minutes. Physiotherapy exercise and strengthening exercise was suggested. Doctor was friendly. Surgery was suggested and we came for second opinion. Doctor told to come after 6 months and it was very good hospital.

My son had visited the hospital and it was health problem. Consultation was fine by the doctor. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle.

review: Very articulate empathetic and sincere. Could see an experienced doctor who is truly dependable . I am happy to have found a dependable Ortho
